scanner.filtering

Class StemAnalyzer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.lucene.analysis.Analyzer
      • scanner.filtering.StemAnalyzer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class StemAnalyzer
extends org.apache.lucene.analysis.Analyzer
    StemAnalyzer extends the Analyzer class from the Apache Lucene library, modified to the project specifications.
    Author:
    Chris Porch porchc0@students.rowan.edu
